modName: The Tropical Great City of Winterhold
summary: An overhaul of Winterhold - bringin the city back to earlier greatness.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/74308-0-1458482787.png[/img]
[color=#b6d7a8][size=3]Credit to [color=#b4a7d6][b]Jokerine[/b][/color] for the Forever Free! logo, download from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/58832/?]here.[/url][/size][/color][color=#b6d7a8][size=3]

[size=5]The Tropical Great City of Winterhold[/size]
While I was partly working on an 'overhaul' for Winterhold, 'SoldierofWar' entered the mod scene with the mod; [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62289]The Great City of Winterhold[/url].
His idea was to rebuild the surroundings of Winterhold to show some proof of the city's great history. He raised the walls and clad the falling terrain down to the sea level with "chunks of walls".
I took care of the city area and hired a lot of workers, carpenters and smiths to join in and start a rebuild of Winterhold.
All new NPCs have daily routines like visiting the inn, eating outside of their workinggrounds, standing guard,  hammering on the walls and 'patroling'
Some new guards are placed on the city walls.
This is also based on the Tropical Skyrim idea by Soolie.

Thanks to Bethesda Softworks for creating wonderous games.
Thanks to my friends on the nexusmods.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22018/]Tamira's awesome plants[/url] contribute largely to the good tropical look! 
NB! You'll need [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33017/?]Tropical Skyrim by Soolie[/url] to get the tropical environment!

-This mod works [u]without[/u] Tropical Skyrim.

Thanks to Bethesda Softworks for creating wonderous games.
Thanks to my friends on the nexusmods.[/size][/color]
author: fredlaus
